sentences.sContent: ...a match that is likely to prove one of the highlights of the tournament.
sentences.sCn: …可能是本届锦标赛最精彩的赛事之一。

synos.tran: 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；[电子]加亮区

remMethod.val: high(高的) + light(发光) → 高调地发光 → 强调， 突出

words.tran: 增强亮度；突出性，醒目性
使…显著；以强光照射（highlight的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 光线最强处，最突出部分
trans.tranOther: the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition
